mutants.code:
from itertools import combinations

def generate_combinations(lst):
    lst = sorted(list(set(lst)))
    combinations_list = list(combinations(lst, 4))
    combinations_list = [combo for combo in combinations_list if combo == tuple(sorted(combo))]
    return combinations_list

mutants.original_line: combinations_list = [combo for combo in combinations_list if combo == tuple(sorted(combo))]
mutants.mutated_line: combinations_list = [combo for combo in combinations_list if combo != tuple(sorted(combo))]
mutants.code:
from itertools import combinations

def generate_combinations(lst):
    lst = sorted(list(set(lst)))
    combinations_list = list(combinations(lst, 3))
    combinations_list = [combo for combo in combinations_list if combo != tuple(sorted(combo))]
    return combinations_list
